text: Isabella Biagini (19 December 1943 – 14 April 2018) was an Italian actress and showgirl. She was born in Rome. She was known for her roles in Love Italian Style, Il clan dei due Borsalini, and for The Future Is Woman. Biagini died of complications from a stroke in Rome on 14 April 2018 at the age of 74.Addio a Isabella Biagini, da Antonioni al varietà ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Isabella Biagini
